SEARCH
Package careerhub.services.student

Class StudentFilterInternshipsService

java.lang.Object
careerhub.services.student.StudentFilterInternshipsService
public class StudentFilterInternshipsService extends Object
Provides filtering functionality for students to search internships based on previously selected or newly entered filter criteria.

This service supports:

  • Using and updating the student's persistent filter preferences
  • Filtering by status, preferred major, level, and closing date
  • Displaying only internships that are visible to students
  • Delegating actual filtering logic to DataManager.filterInternships(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

Only visible internships are shown, and company-based filtering is intentionally omitted for student users.

      sc - the shared Scanner for reading console input

  • Method Details

    • filter

      public void filter(Student student)
      Allows a student to filter internships by updating and using their stored filter preferences.

      Workflow:

      1. Prompt the student for each filter field, allowing Enter to keep the previous value
      2. Update the student's saved filter settings
      3. Call DataManager.filterInternships(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) with the student's filters
      4. Display matching internships, or notify if none found

      Students only see internships that are visible; company name is not included as a filter option in the student view.

      Parameters:
      student - the student whose filter preferences and eligibility apply
